thread.title: Beyoncé is Doing Intense SoulCycle Workouts While Pregnant
thread.title_full: Beyoncé is Doing Intense SoulCycle Workouts While Pregnant

title: Beyoncé is Doing Intense SoulCycle Workouts While Pregnant
text:
Beyoncé is Doing Intense SoulCycle Workouts While Pregnant March 9, 2017 @ 7:43 PM By Ingrid Meilan 
Ladies, get in formation! On your SoulCycle bikes, that is! Beyoncé may be pregnant with twins , but she isn’t slacking off on her workouts. Sources tell Us Weekly that Queen B has been attending the cult-favorite spinning class at studios all over Los Angeles. “She’s been taking a class almost every day,” an insider tells Us. Beyonce's Baby Bump Style Beyonce during The Weinstein Company Pre-Oscars dinner in 2017. Courtesy Beyonce 
Beyoncé is almost always accompanied by her husband, Jay Z (how sweet!), but a fellow classmate also saw the 20-time Grammy winner in an evening class at the West Hollywood studio on March 8 with BFF and former Destiny's Child bandmate Kelly Rowland by her side. (Also spotted in the same star-studded class: Usher , Lee Daniels and Jenna Dewan Tatum !) 
Onlookers tell Us that while Beyoncé and Jay Z often sneak into classes after the lights go down and leave early, they’re still spotted in classes “several times a week.” Jay Z, Beyonce and Blue Ivy during Beauty And The Beast premiere in 2017. Courtesy Beyonce See All of Beyonce’s Grammys Looks Through the Years 
And Beyoncé’s favorite teacher is a VIP herself: The Lemonade singer has been seen frequenting classes led by Angela Davis , who impressed Oprah so much that the former talk-show host took the instructor along on her The Life You Want tour to teach SoulCycle classes on the road.
